Welcome to the documentation of the PojoApplication. The application provides a rest interface to store the class structure of Pojos (Plain Old Java Objects). It includes inheritance and attributes of Pojos. Generics and arrays are not considered. The Pojos can be uploaded as .jar file or as .class file. The tools to handle such files can be found in de.fh.kiel.advancedjava.pojoapplication.binaryreading. To store the data a neo4j graph database is used. The access to the database is configured in the "application.yaml". The database access occurs via repositories. The repositories are located in the package de.fh.kiel.advancedjava.pojoapplication.repository. The model to store the data structure for the Pojos can be found in de.fh.kiel.advancedjava.pojoapplication.pojomodel, where an UML diagram is also placed. A service layer can be found in de.fh.kiel.advancedjava.pojoapplication.rest.service. Each service has a corresponding rest controller in de.fh.kiel.advancedjava.pojoapplication.rest.controller. There a some special data structures for providing the data via json in the rest API located in de.fh.kiel.advancedjava.pojoapplication.rest.restmodel.
Packages
Package Description
de.fh.kiel.advancedjava.pojoapplication
This is the entry point for the spring boot application.
de.fh.kiel.advancedjava.pojoapplication.binaryreading
Classes for reading of java binaries
de.fh.kiel.advancedjava.pojoapplication.config
Swagger Configuration
de.fh.kiel.advancedjava.pojoapplication.pojomodel
Model layer of the PojoApplicattion.
de.fh.kiel.advancedjava.pojoapplication.repository
Contains the Pojo repositories for communication with the neo4j database
de.fh.kiel.advancedjava.pojoapplication.rest.controller
Controller layer, contains controllers for handling API requests
de.fh.kiel.advancedjava.pojoapplication.rest.exceptions
Exceptions for the service layer
de.fh.kiel.advancedjava.pojoapplication.rest.restmodel
Contains various data models for API responses
de.fh.kiel.advancedjava.pojoapplication.rest.service
Service layer, provides the services for processing API requests
de.fh.kiel.advancedjava.pojoapplication.utils
Package for utility classes
